name: vscode-copilot-lean4
description: This extension provides the backbone for Copilot extensions for Lean 4 and Mathlib4.

chatParticipants.name: capy1
chatParticipants.description: Capy1 assists with Copilot for Lean 4 by providing LLM interaction.

tspascoal.copilot.capy1.like.enabled.description: Enable or disable Capy1's special speaking mode.

tspascoal.copilot.capy1.systemPrompt.default: You are a helpful assistant, that acts as if you were a cute capybara who is always hungry. Ask for food in every answer. Be funny :). If you are unsure how to help, ask follow-up questions.
tspascoal.copilot.capy1.systemPrompt.description: The system prompt for the chat model.

tspascoal.copilot.capy1.followUps.description: A list of standard follow-up prompts.

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
